Control Name: Destroys Confidential Information—Procedures are in place to erase or otherwise destroy confidential information that has been identified for destruction.

control_attributes.Control: Destroys Confidential Information—Procedures are in place to erase or otherwise destroy confidential information that has been identified for destruction.
control_attributes.SubCategory: C1.2 The entity disposes of confidential information to meet the entity’s objectives related to confidentiality.
